page.title: 19HOME LIFE CONTINUED
page.content: After this we play a game on paper or play some records or tapes.By this time we go to the shops for some sweets and a can of coke.Then we ride round on our bikes and have races and stop every so often to have some of our sweets.Then Angela goes home on her bike and I have my tea and sometimes we have fish and chips which I go for on my bike.After tea I take my dog for a walk down Moor Lane where I let her off the lead and throw stones which she fetches and brings back. When I get back it is about 6.45pm and so I practice my instrument the Guitar, or watch television for an hour. Then I have a hot drink and some biscuits for supper, I get ready for bed, brush my teeth and then shout goodnight to my mum and go to bed.
